content: you can use just about any yarn within reason i wouldn t use fun fur and almost any crochet hook for this pattern you can also use any size hook with this pattern gauge doesnt really matter with this pattern just depends on what you want it to look like i ve made doilies with thread and dishcloths with crochet cotton with this pattern you can make it as large as you want by adding rounds edit august 2017 just realized that photobucket has blocked all my pictures on my blog they ve blocked everyone s pictures on the internet that doesn t want to pay their ransom real life has not been great this year for me once i get a calm minute to get my pictures and organize them on another photosharing site i ll update the blog
